name: Strong Attack+
effects: Increases C1 attack damage.

name: Strength II
effects: Increases C2 attack damage.

name: Strength III
effects: Increases C3 attack damage.

name: Strength IV
effects: Increases C4 attack damage.

name: Strength V
effects: Increases C5 attack damage.

name: Strength VI
effects: Increases C6 attack damage.

name: Fire+
effects: Increases blast radius of exploding foes.

name: Water+
effects: Increases duration of continuous damage effects.

name: Lightning+
effects: Makes it easier to juggle enemies with air combos.

name: Light+
effects: Increases duration of damage effects.

name: Darkness+
effects: Damage effects occur against multiple enemies.

name: Slots+
effects: Increases chances of a many-slotted weapon drop.

name: Stars+
effects: Increases chances of a high-star weapon drop.

name: Hearts+
effects: Hearts drop more easily.

name: Rupees+
effects: Increases number of Rupees dropped by enemies.

name: Materials+
effects: Makes it easier to obtain good materials.

name: Food+
effects: Makes it easier to obtain food items.

name: EXP+
effects: Increases experience points fallen enemies give.

name: Health+
effects: Defeating enemies restores health.

name: Special+
effects: Defeating enemies restores Special Attack gauge.

name: Bombs+
effects: Defeating enemies powers up bombs.

name: Arrows+
effects: Defeating enemies powers up bow and arrows.

name: Boomerang+
effects: Defeating enemies powers up boomerang.

name: Hookshot+
effects: Defeating enemies powers up hookshot.

name: Hammer+
effects: Defeating enemies powers up hammer.

name: VS Legend
effects: Increases damage against Link, Zelda, Ganondorf, Young Link, Linkle, Toon Link, Toon Zelda, and Ravio

name: VS Skyward
effects: Increases damage against Impa, Fi, and Ghirahim.

name: VS Twilight
effects: Increases damage against Midna, Agitha, Zant, and Twili Midna.

name: VS Time
effects: Increases damage against Darunia, Ruto, Sheik, Young Link, and Tingle. However, it does not increase damage against Young Link or Tingle in Hyrule Warriors Legends.

name: VS Sea
effects: Increases damage against Toon Link, Tetra, King Daphnes, Medli, Marin, and Toon Zelda.

name: VS Termina
effects: Increases damage against Young Link, Tingle, and Skull Kid.

name: VS Sorceress
effects: Increases damage against Cia and Lana.

name: VS Ganon
effects: Increases damage against Ganon, Phantom Ganon, and Yuga.

name: VS Soldier
effects: Increases damage against Hyrulean Captains, Goron Captains, Moblins, Shield Moblins, Big Blins, and Stone Blins.

name: VS Undead
effects: Increases damage against Wizzro, Big Poe, Icy Big Poe, Gibdo, ReDead Knight, Darknut, and Stalmaster.

name: VS Beast
effects: Increases damage against Manhandla, Gohma, The Imprisoned, and Helmaroc King.

name: VS Dragon
effects: Increases damage against King Dodongo, Argorok, Volga, Lizalfos, Dinolfos, Aeralfos, and Fiery Aeralfos.

name: Compatriot
effects: Deal more damage when allied army has more keeps.

name: One-Hit Kill
effects: Increases chances of instantly defeating weak enemies.

name: Sturdy Feet
effects: Take more damage, but never get knocked back.

name: Regen
effects: Take more damage, but regain health over time.

name: Defenseless
effects: Unable to block, but attacks deal more damage.

name: No Healing
effects: Minimizes healing effects, but attacks deal more damage.

name: Adversity
effects: Deal more damage when health is low.

name: Hasty Attacks
effects: Regular and combo attacks become faster.

name: Normal Attack+
effects: Increases the damage of regular and combo attacks.

name: Special Attack+
effects: Increases the damage of special attacks.

name: Finishing Blow+
effects: Increases the damage of weak point smash attacks.

name: Focus Spirit+
effects: Increases attack damage by 1/16 of predefined stage damage cap while Focus Mode is in effect.

name: Heartstrong
effects: Increases attack damage while health is full.

name: Heart Power
effects: Each 5 hearts of max hearts increase damage.

name: Legendary
effects: Increases base weapon strength to 560.

name: Evil's Bane
effects: Increases base weapon strength by 200.

name: Exorcism
effects: Increases base weapon strength by 400.
